nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_333_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Many of these poems bear witness to his years spent in India, England, and China.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_334_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The other players in the team are better than me, but I'm slowly catching up.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_335_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was loaded with many parcels, unable to walk any faster.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_336_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The place was deserted and there was no sign of human beings living there.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_337_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: These instruments should be switched on and checked before we start our work.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_338_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: My friend was dressed in a black coat whereas I was in jeans.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_339_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: All those connected with the mission were in prayer for her, but her life was not spared.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_340_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: May I excuse myself for a while, Mr. Davis?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_341_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Have you ever noticed that at yesterday's concert one of the violinists was out of tune?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_342_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: All too soon it was over and we left feeling we had just skimmed the surface of this fascinating topic.
